parameters.name: Description
parameters.value:
Check for below Scenario,
1) Product Name : Group Aarogya Sanjeevani
2) Policy Plan : Family Floater
3) Business Type : New Business
4) Members : 3A + 1C(Self + Spouse + Mother)
5) Highest Highest Member Age Band  : 36Y-45Y
6) Health Loading (Alochol, tobacco, smoking,BMI,Asthma,Diabetes, Hyperlipidemia,Hypothyroidism,Hypertension) : 
7) Health Loading Self :No (smoking,alchohol,tobbacco)
8) Health Loading Spouse :  No (smoking,alchohol)
9) Mother :  No
10) Child 1 : No
11) SI : 300000
12) Stamp Duty: (Highest sum insured/1000)* Rs. 0.05/- {Considering that premium for per 1000/- sum insured is less than Rs. 2.50/-}
